derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (fever) terciane, from Latin (febris) tertiana, from tertius 'third' (the fever recurring every third day by inclusive reckoning)

means.word_mean: 1. relating to symptoms (especially malarial fever) that appear every other day;
2. of or relating to a tonal system based on major thirds;
